title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create, list, copy, delete, and show models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with Node & browser support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with model management, chat history, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool to chat with Ollama models, manage models, and run batch prompts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo for building RAG pipelines using Ollama embeddings + LangChain + Chroma/Qdrant.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app integrating Ollama for chat completions, embeddings, and admin model management.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming and Swagger docs.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for distributed inference and autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama chat and image-to-text into any server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel chat with thread support.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: Swift package wrapping Ollama REST API for macOS/iOS apps using async/await.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with tokio streaming and strong typing.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and retry middleware.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of docker-compose stacks combining Ollama with Open-WebUI, Flowise, n8n, etc.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Scripts to convert and upload Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format.
